vulnerabilities.title: Cross-site Scripting in bootstrap-table
vulnerabilities.description: Bootstrap Tables XSS vulnerability with Table Export plug-in when exportOptions: htmlContent is true in GitHub repository wenzhixin/bootstrap-table prior to 1.20.2. Disclosing session cookies, disclosing secure session data, exfiltrating data to third-parties.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross-site Scripting in bootstrap-table
vulnerabilities.description: This affects all versions of package bootstrap-table. A type confusion vulnerability can lead to a bypass of input sanitization when the input provided to the escapeHTML function is an array (instead of a string) even if the escape attribute is set.
